The Kryptonians are a race that has been destroyed by their own sun, which has become a weapon against them. They have only existed for several thousand years and are now extinct.
The Kryptonians have sent their son Kal-El to Earth in a spacecraft made of special materials that can withstand the intense heat generated by the sun. The spacecraft also contains food and water supplies that will allow Kal-El to survive on Earth until he grows strong enough to defeat the evil forces led by General Zod (Michael Shannon)) who have been sent to Earth by their own planet in order to conquer Earth and rule over humanity.
